content: stitches total rnds 16-19 single_crochet in back loop of same stitch single_crochet in back loops of all stitches around join with slip_stitch to starting single_crochet both loops 60 single_crochet total fasten_off after last round finishing weave in ends with yarn needle slouchy button beanie instructions crochet rounds 1-11 as given above rnds 12-14 repeat round 11 round 15 chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in chain 1 and in next 2 stitches decrease over chain 1 space and next stitch *single_crochet in next four stitches include chain 1 space as a stitch decrease over next chain 1 space and stitch repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to starting single_crochet 60 stitches total round 16 chain 7 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in the next 5 chs first row of tab created continuing on to hat single_crochet in back loop of first stitch and all stitches across chain 1 and turn 66 single_crochet total rnds 17-19 single_crochet in both loops of all stitches across chain 1 and turn 66 single_crochet total round 20 single_crochet in all stitches across fasten_off leaving a 2 foot yarn tail for sewing down tab and sewing on button 66 single_crochet total finishing using yarn tail sew down tab to edging of hat with 3 or 4 stitches weaving through fabric between stitches continue with tail and stitch on button in center of tab fasten_off and weave in ends with yarn needle 4 | p age
